sentences.en: Another half meter closer to those grenades and he'd have lost the eardrum.
sentences.cn: 要是再离声光雷近个半米他的鼓膜就废了.

sentences.en: Conclusions: Biologic protein sponge is effective material mending the perforation of eardrum.
sentences.cn: 结论生物蛋白海绵可促进鼓膜穿孔修复和愈合.

sentences.en: His eardrum was broken in the accident.
sentences.cn: 在事故中他的耳膜破了.

sentences.en: If the eardrum has been broken, never try irrigation.
sentences.cn: 如耳膜破裂, 则绝对不可灌水.

sentences.en: My right eardrum has become infected.
sentences.cn: 我的右耳鼓已经感染了.

sentences.en: My right eardrum has been infected.
Never try irrigation if eardrum is borkenbroken.
sentences.cn: 若是耳膜有破裂,千万别尝试耳道灌洗.

sentences.en: Never try irrigation if the ear drum ( eardrum ) is broken.
sentences.cn: 如果 耳鼓 破了,就不能试着灌水.

sentences.en: Never try irrigation if the eardrum is broken.
sentences.cn: 如果耳膜破了,千万不要尝试这种冲洗法.

sentences.en: Never try irrigation if the eardrum is broken. It could lead to infection and other problems.
sentences.cn: 如果耳膜破了, 千万别用冲洗法,因为有可能导致感染或其他问题.

sentences.en: Never try irrigation irrigation if ear drum eardrum is broken.
sentences.cn: 如果耳膜破裂,千万不能使用冲洗法.

sentences.en: Never try irrigation irrigation if the ear eardrum is broken.
sentences.cn: 如果耳道破了不要使用冲洗法.

sentences.en: Objective To improve clinically recognition of the eardrum - mastoid process operation.
sentences.cn: 目的提高临床对中耳乳突手术的认识.

sentences.en: Of or relating to the middle ear or eardrum.
sentences.cn: 局限在耳朵中间或内部的疼痛.

sentences.en: Sound waves reach the eardrum through the external auditory canal, tympanic membrane caused by vibration.
sentences.cn: 通过声波到达外耳道鼓膜, 鼓膜的振动造成的.

sentences.en: The blast burst Ollie Williams' eardrum.
sentences.cn: 爆炸声震破了奥利·威廉斯的耳鼓。

trans.tran_en: a tight thin piece of skin over the inside of your ear which allows you to hear sound
